paragraph: Clara D'Ovar (1925–2002) was a Portuguese singer and film actress. She starred in several French and Portuguese films during the 1960s. She was born on 4 November 1925 in Ovar, Portugal. She passed 30 June 2002 in Ovar, Portugal.
Jean-Pierre Berthomé & Gaël Naizet. Bretagne et cinéma: cent ans de création cinématographique en Bretagne. Cinémathèque de Bretagne, 1995.
